gameDetails.name: Joyride: Big Day Out
gameDetails.description:
Joyride: Big Day Out is an exclusive expansion, with new maps to race through. Just be careful to avoid the local wildlife!

Big Day Out includes 11 tracks across two large maps, new destructible barriers, lava flows, and the mighty Hippaboon, a beast who will roam the board damaging any cars that get too close!


    The Hippaboon jumps from platform to platform, attacking anything that takes a corner too tightly.
    Volcano Island map
    Wonder Zoo map
